EmailTemplate.name: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for registering for this complimentary live webinar.
You will receive a reminder email one week and one day prior to the live webinar. Your webinar information is listed below.
Jay Fitch and Dan Voss look forward to an engaging discussion on April 26th and are glad that you've decided to join us!
Webinar attendees will also receive a promotional code for $25 off their Pinnacle 2012 Conference Registration - pinnacle-ems.com <http://pinnacle-ems.com/>.
See online on April 26!
Thanks for Registering for the Complimentary Live Webinar: EMS Changes, Challenges and Opportunities under Healthcare Reform
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/yzcxpkv
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for registering for this complimentary live webinar.
Jay Fitch, PhD, Fitch & Associates Dan Voss, TriTech Product Manager look forward to sharing both the business and user perspectives of the web-based trend in EMS Software.
You will receive a reminder email one week and one day prior to the live webinar. Your webinar information is list to the right.
See online on April 26!
WEBINAR DETAILS DATE: Thursday April 26, 2012 TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS: Jay Fitch, PhD, Fitch & Associates Dan Voss, TriTech Senior Product Manager
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/yzcxpkv
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
